name: Kroger Co.
summary: The Kroger Co. is the largest supermarket operator in the United States, operating over 2,700 grocery stores under various banners across 35 states and the District of Columbia. Founded in 1883 and headquartered in Cincinnati, Kroger is a Fortune 500 company and one of the nation’s largest private employers, also running food production facilities, fuel centers, and pharmacies. The company is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker KR, with a market capitalization exceeding $47 billion as of June 2025.
